attribute.name.spellbladenext.convertfro: Arcane Power gained as Attack Damage
Fire Power gained as Attack Damage
Frost Power gained as Attack Damage
attribute.name.spellbladenext.converttoa: Attack Damage gained as Arcane Power
attribute.name.spellbladenext.converttof: Attack Damage gained as Fire Power
Attack Damage gained as Frost Power
attribute.name.spellbladenext.converttoh: Attack Damage gained as Healing Power
attribute.name.spellbladenext.ephemeral: of Absorption Gained as Lightning Power
attribute.name.spellbladenext.purpose: of Non-Healing Spell Power gained as Healing Power
error.spellbladenext.shieldreq: I need a shield to do this.
item.spellbladenext.spelloil.desc1: Binds the spell to an item that can cast spells, but does not already have a spell bound.
item.spellbladenext.spelloil.desc2: Drag to an item and right click to apply. IRREVERSIBLE. See Spell Engine Keybind 1 if used incorrrectly.
item.spellbladenext.tabula_rasa.desc: If you wish to be reborn, empty is the best way to be.
item.spellbladenext.tabula_rasa.desc2: Apply up to six Spell Oils onto this item.
item.spellbladenext.thesis_spell_book.de: Fear not the mage who has cast a thousand different spells once, fear the mage who has cast a single spell a thousand times.
Awaken your spell at a spell binding table.
spell.spellbladenext.advancing_strike.de: Deal {damage} physical damage in a cone in front of you and teleport forward two blocks.
spell.spellbladenext.amethyst_slash.desc: {damage} Arcane DPS. Swing your weapon wildly, shooting piercing amethyst projectiles.
spell.spellbladenext.amethyst_slash.name: Amethyst Splash
spell.spellbladenext.arcane_blink.descri: Teleport behind an enemy, dealing {damage_1} physical damage plus an additional {damage_2} arcane damage.
spell.spellbladenext.arcane_blink.name: Arcane Flicker
spell.spellbladenext.arcane_burst.descri: On melee hit, release up to 8 arcane tendrils towards nearby enemies, each dealing {damage} arcane damage.
spell.spellbladenext.arcane_burst.name: Arcane Burst
On melee hit, deal {damage} extra arcane damage.
spell.spellbladenext.arcaneflourish.desc: Spin rapidly, dealing {damage_1} physical damage, plus {damage_2} arcane damage.
spell.spellbladenext.arcaneflourish.name: Arcane Flourish
spell.spellbladenext.arctic_armor.descri: Give yourself a buff that retaliates with cold damage against enemies nearby enemies that damage you, dealing {damage} frost damage, heavy knockback, and inflicting Wintertide.
spell.spellbladenext.arctic_armor.name: Arctic Armor
spell.spellbladenext.bladestorm.descript: Conjure a reverberating vortex, which homes into your target if you selected one, dealing {damage} arcane damage every half second.
spell.spellbladenext.bladestorm.name: Echostorm
spell.spellbladenext.bolster.description: Give yourself or an ally armor based on 1.5x your healing power.
spell.spellbladenext.bolster.name: Bolster
spell.spellbladenext.bulwark.description: Give yourself the Bulwark of the Weak status for 16 seconds. During this duration, you glow and are 25%% larger, and heal allies in an area every 2 seconds. Cooldown is shared between all party members.
spell.spellbladenext.bulwark.name: Bulwark of the Weak
spell.spellbladenext.challenge.descripti: Aggravate an enemy, making them redirect their aggro every time they take damage. When killed, aggravated enemies heal and bolster their enemies while weakening their friends.
spell.spellbladenext.challenge.name: Aggravate
spell.spellbladenext.combustion.descript: Passive: On a cooldown, Your damage sets enemies on fire for 2 seconds and gives them Phoenix's Curse for the same duration, dealing {damage} fire spell damage 4 times over 2 seconds. Enemies that have Phoenix Curse count as being On Fire, if not already On Fire. Active: Set the ground on fire, dealing the same damage 16 times over 8 seconds in an area.
spell.spellbladenext.combustion.name: Phoenix Curse
spell.spellbladenext.defiance_of_destiny: Passive: Upon taking damage, you gain Defiance, up to 3 stacks. Defiance heals you for an amount based on your maximum health and the number of stacks before you take damage, with a half second cooldown. Active: Continuously pound your shield, dealing {damage} armor based damage to nearby enemies, taunting them, and giving yourself Defiance 6.
spell.spellbladenext.dragon_slam.descrip: Perform a fiery slam, first launching yourself into the air if already airborne. Deals {damage_1} physical damage plus an additional {damage_2} fire damage in an area. You can land safely while performing this move.
spell.spellbladenext.dragon_slam.name: Dragon Slam
spell.spellbladenext.echoes.description: Two seconds after another spell from this spell book hits an enemy, this spell deals {damage} arcane damage to the same enemy.
spell.spellbladenext.echoes.name: Echoes
spell.spellbladenext.echofall.descriptio: Send down a barrage of eight sound waves, each dealing {damage} arcane damage in a small area.
spell.spellbladenext.echofall.name: Echofall
spell.spellbladenext.eldritchblast.descr: Fire a blast in the target direction, dealing {damage} arcane damage to all enemies in a line.
spell.spellbladenext.eldritchblast.name: Reverberating Ray
spell.spellbladenext.encore.name: Encore
spell.spellbladenext.eviscerate.descript: Become intangible, attacking the nearest enemy five times over a second, dealing {damage_1} physical damage and {damage_2} frost damage over 1 second. If this kills the enemy, this spell continues on the next nearest enemy.
spell.spellbladenext.eviscerate.name: Massacre
Your next 8 hits of Feather Lash explode, dealing {damage} in a small area. With this buff, you have 5%% increased fire power and spell haste per remaining feather.
spell.spellbladenext.feather_lash.descri: Shoot a feather projectile, dealing {damage} fire damage to the first enemy hit.
spell.spellbladenext.feather_lash.name: Feather Lash
spell.spellbladenext.featherstorm.descri: Upon hitting an enemy with Feather Lash, you have a chance to shoot three more feather projectiles at the same enemy.
spell.spellbladenext.featherstorm.name: Featherstorm
spell.spellbladenext.fire_spellstrike.de: On melee hit, deal {damage} extra fire damage.
spell.spellbladenext.fireflourish.descri: Spin rapidly, dealing {damage_1} physical damage, plus {damage_2} fire damage.
spell.spellbladenext.fireflourish.name: Fire Flourish
spell.spellbladenext.flame_burst.descrip: On melee hit, deal {damage} fire damage in a cone in front of you.
spell.spellbladenext.flame_burst.name: Flame Burst
spell.spellbladenext.flame_slash.descrip: {damage} Fire DPS. Swing your weapon wildly, shooting flaming, exploding projectiles.
spell.spellbladenext.flame_slash.name: Flame Reave
spell.spellbladenext.flamelance.descript: Incinerate a line in front of you, dealing {damage} fire damage to each enemy.
spell.spellbladenext.flamelance.name: Flame Lance
spell.spellbladenext.flickering_flame.de: Unleash a series of sixteen teleporting strikes on nearby enemies, distributed equally among them. Deals {damage_1} physical damage plus an additional {damage_2} fire damage per hit, at 4x your normal attack speed.
spell.spellbladenext.frost_burst.descrip: On melee hit, launch up to 4 piercing frost blades towards enemies in a cone in front of you, each dealing {damage} frost damage}.
spell.spellbladenext.frost_burst.name: Frost Burst
spell.spellbladenext.frost_slash.descrip: {damage} Frost DPS. Swing your weapon wildly, shooting bouncing, ricocheting blade projectiles.
spell.spellbladenext.frost_slash.name: Blade Flurry
spell.spellbladenext.frost_spellstrike.d: On melee hit, deal {damage} extra frost damage.
spell.spellbladenext.frostflourish.descr: Spin rapidly, dealing {damage_1} physical damage, plus {damage_2} frost damage.
spell.spellbladenext.frostflourish.name: Frost Flourish
spell.spellbladenext.frostgrasp.descript: Chill the target area with a frozen grasp, dealing {damage} frost damage. Enemies with Wintertide on them take 50% more damage from this spell.
spell.spellbladenext.frostgrasp.name: Winter's Grasp
spell.spellbladenext.grandstanding.descr: Give everyone nearby (including enemies) Strength based on your Healing Power for 12 seconds.
spell.spellbladenext.grandstanding.name: Supreme Grandstanding
spell.spellbladenext.healing_feathers.de: Your next 8 hits of Feather Lash heal you, restoring {heal} points of health. With this buff, you have 0.5 additional healing power per remaining feather.
spell.spellbladenext.inexorable.descript: While active, your Defiant Stance passive no longer has a limit.
spell.spellbladenext.inexorable.name: Inexorable
spell.spellbladenext.inferno.description: Spin continuously, dealing {damage_1} physical damage and {damage_2} fire damage per second.
spell.spellbladenext.inferno.name: Inferno
spell.spellbladenext.lightning_spellstri: On melee hit, deal {damage} extra lightning damage.
{damage} Lightning damage in an area around you. Activates normally and on hit.
spell.spellbladenext.lightningslash.desc: {damage} Lightning DPS. Swing your weapon wildly, shooting charged, chaining projectiles.
spell.spellbladenext.lightningslash.name: Charge Slash
spell.spellbladenext.lightningstep.descr: Become invulnerable, surging towards the target direction and dealing {damage} lightning dps to very close enemies.
spell.spellbladenext.lightningstep.name: Surge
spell.spellbladenext.maelstrom.descripti: Spin continuously, dealing {damage_1} physical damage and {damage_2} arcane damage per second.
spell.spellbladenext.maelstrom.name: Maelstrom
spell.spellbladenext.mass_hypothermia.de: All enemies in an area take {damage} frost damage if they are inflicted with Wintertide.
spell.spellbladenext.monkeyreflect.descr: Spin up a gust of wind, dealing heavy knockback and {damage} physical damage per second to the target enemy.
spell.spellbladenext.monkeyreflect.name: Rending Winds
spell.spellbladenext.overblaze.descripti: Incinerate enemies in a line, dealing {damage} spell damage.
spell.spellbladenext.overblaze.name: Incinerating Round
spell.spellbladenext.overpower.descripti: Charge forward, dragging nearby enemies along your path, dealing {damage_1} physical damage and {damage_2} healing damage at the end of the channel. Targets hit by the final hit are Sundered for six seconds, losing all armor stats and becoming immobile. Players are knocked prone for this duration.
spell.spellbladenext.overpower.name: Overpower
spell.spellbladenext.phase_dash.descript: Change your combat roll to a floating dash, greatly reducing gravity.
spell.spellbladenext.phase_dash.name: Phase Rush
spell.spellbladenext.phoenix_dive.descri: Blink towards the target direction, performing a nova for {damage} fire damage upon landing.
spell.spellbladenext.phoenix_dive.name: Phoenix Dive
spell.spellbladenext.phoenixdive.descrip: Blink towards the target direction, performing a nova for {damage} fire damage upon landing and setting hit enemies on fire.
spell.spellbladenext.phoenixdive.name: Phoenix Dive
spell.spellbladenext.protect.description: Give yourself or an ally Resistance based on your Healing Power for 2 seconds.
spell.spellbladenext.protect.name: Protect
spell.spellbladenext.rebuke.description: Throw a spear dealing {damage} healing damage, inflicting Slowness 2 and Weakness 2.
spell.spellbladenext.rebuke.name: Rebuke
spell.spellbladenext.resonance.descripti: Give yourself the Resonance buff, halving your Spell Haste but doubling your Arcane Power.
spell.spellbladenext.resonance.name: Resonance
spell.spellbladenext.reverberation_brand: Brand an enemy for 30 seconds, making them take {damage} arcane damage every second.
spell.spellbladenext.riflebarrage.descri: Shoot repeatedly while channeling, dealing up to 1x ranged damage plus an additional {damage} spell damage per shot to enemies in a cone, based on proximity.
spell.spellbladenext.riflebarrage.name: Scrap Barrage
spell.spellbladenext.riptide.description: Aim and launch yourself as if with a riptide-enchanted trident
spell.spellbladenext.riptide.name: Riptide
spell.spellbladenext.seraph_strike.descr: Strike the area in front of you, dealing {damage} physical melee damage to enemies and healing friendlies for {heal} health in an area in front of you, including yourself.
spell.spellbladenext.seraph_strike.name: Seraph Strike
spell.spellbladenext.shared_suffering.de: When you damage an enemy with Wintertide or Mass Hypothermia, nearby enemies with Wintertide on them take {damage} frost damage.
spell.spellbladenext.shield_shatter.desc: Throw a bouncing shield, dealing {damage} armor-based damage to each enemy hit. Consumes Bolster.
spell.spellbladenext.shield_shatter.name: Shield Shatter
spell.spellbladenext.smite.description: Passive: Your hits give you Fervor for 4 seconds, which gives you 10%% of your Attack Damage gained as Healing Power, up to 3 stacks. Active: Smite enemies in front of you in an area, dealing {damage_1} physical and {damage_2} extra healing damage to each enemy hit, sending nearby enemies flying.
spell.spellbladenext.smite.name: Divine Smite
spell.spellbladenext.sniper.description: Charge and shoot your rifle, dealing 2x ranged damage and an additional {damage} ranged physical damage.
spell.spellbladenext.sniper.name: Runeblaze Round
spell.spellbladenext.snuffout.descriptio: The flames around you blaze into an inferno, causing burning to deal {damage} fire damage in an area around them.
spell.spellbladenext.snuffout.name: Wildfire
spell.spellbladenext.sonic_strike.descri: Charge up a deadly attack against all enemies in a line, teleporting behind the last one and dealing {damage_1} physical damage plus an additional {damage_2} arcane spell damage.
spell.spellbladenext.sonic_strike.name: Sonic Strike
spell.spellbladenext.soul_of_vengeance.d: Refresh your Fervor, setting it to 5 for 8 seconds.
spell.spellbladenext.spellstrike.descrip: Activate to gain the Spellstrike buff for 16 seconds, granting 50%% spell haste. You deal 80%% of your highest spell power as spell damage of that type on melee attack, with no cooldown. This effect goes on full cooldown when it ends, which can be done early by activating again.
spell.spellbladenext.spellstrike.name: Spellstrike
spell.spellbladenext.symbol_of_hope.desc: Place a symbol of hope on an ally or yourself, granting 20%% damage taken to health returned as health over four seconds. This effect stacks to three and lasts twelve seconds.
spell.spellbladenext.symbol_of_hope.name: Symbol of Hope
spell.spellbladenext.tempest.description: Spin continuously, dealing {damage_1} physical damage and {damage_2} frost damage per second.
spell.spellbladenext.tempest.name: Tempest
spell.spellbladenext.thesis.description: You have dedicated your life to the casting of one particular spell. You have 50%% more spell power and spell haste.
spell.spellbladenext.thesis.name: Awakened
spell.spellbladenext.vaulting_slam.descr: Use your staff to vault into the air, slamming at the end of the cast for {damage} physical damage in an area. You are invulnerable while vaulting.
spell.spellbladenext.vaulting_slam.name: Vaulting Slam
spell.spellbladenext.whirling_assault.de: Perform a series of whirling strikes, dealing {damage} physical damage per second.
spell.spellbladenext.whirlwind.descripti: Spin continuously, {damage} physical damage per second.
spell.spellbladenext.whirlwind.name: Cyclone
spell.spellbladenext.winters_expanse.des: Inflict Wintertide on all nearby enemies, slowing them by 20%%.
spell.spellbladenext.wintertide.descript: Blast an enemy with frost energies for {damage} frost damage, inflicting Wintertide for them for 8 seconds, slowing them by 20%%.
spell.spellbladenext.wintertide.name: Wintertide
spell.spellbladenext.xslash.description: Attack three times over half a second, dealing {damage_1} physical dps, plus {damage_2} lightning dps. You are invulnerable while attacking.
spell.spellbladenext.xslash.name: Cross Slash
spellbladenext.spellbladetext: Upon casting a spell with this Spellblade, you gain Strength and Haste equal to a quarter of your power relating to the spell's school, for up to however long the cooldown of the spell is.
